title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 27 June 2012 - XWiki
content:
00:08 <CIA-35> Denis Gervalle master \* rfad62f7 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/fad62f76993d01edf165133a938f2bd03f34b757 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-oldcore/src/main/java/com/xpn/xwiki/stats/impl/XWikiStats.java : XWIKI-7976: Migration R40000XWIKI6990 (IDs) fails to properly migrate document statistics - http://git.io/YJovJw  
00:08 <CIA-35> Denis Gervalle stable-4.1.x \* r303e14f https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/303e14f0f9e4e2835120f0f65f1e9177a3b032ab / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-oldcore/src/main/java/com/xpn/xwiki/stats/impl/XWikiStats.java : XWIKI-7976: Migration R40000XWIKI6990 (IDs) fails to properly migrate document statistics - http://git.io/\_U8wGA  
00:08 <jvdrean1> has quit  
00:57 <evalica> has quit  
01:05 <polx> has quit  
02:30 <tekzilla> has quit  
02:32 <tekzilla> has joined #xwiki  
02:34 <Enygma`> has quit  
03:50 <D-Spair> is now known as <DSpair\_AFK>  
06:51 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
07:04 <Denis2> has joined #xwiki  
07:06 <Denis> has quit  
07:45 <ssavi> has quit  
07:59 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
08:08 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:15 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
08:52 <jvelo> nice charts : http://eclipsehowl.wordpress.com/2012/06/26/juno-the-best-simultaneous-release-of-its-time/  
08:56 <rrodriguez> has quit  
08:59 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
09:06 <vmassol> jvelo: hehe I've sent the following messgae on skype on the xwiki sas dev channel about 1 hour ago: "Nice Eclipse stats: http://eclipsehowl.wordpress.com/2012/06/26/juno-the-best-simultaneous-release-of-its-time/ Quite impressive" ;)  
09:06 <vmassol> their bug count isn't that nice though  
09:07 <+sburjan`> maybe they don't have enough testers  
09:07 <vmassol> maybe they have too much  
09:07 <vmassol> too many  
09:07 <vmassol> because the more testers the more bugs you find  
09:07 <vmassol> so if testers numbers increase you'll get more bugs reported  
09:07 <vmassol> :)  
09:08 <+sburjan`> :)  
09:09 <evalica> has quit  
09:09 <polx> has quit  
09:13 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
09:13 <CIA-35> tmortagne master \* rc466781 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-commons/commit/c466781dd242d92e15cca7fb9735ea142ac22890 / (2 files): Apply codestyle - http://git.io/d3zu4g  
09:14 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
09:14 <vmassol> good morning, seems we'll have to release a 4.1.3 quickly after all….  
09:15 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
09:20 <vmassol> see http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotesXWikiEnterprise412  
09:21 <@cjd> Good morning  
09:21 <@cjd> "We've found an important issue in this release with our automatic data migration when upgrading from 4.0 or before."  Actually I think this is the 3.x -> 4.0 migration  
09:22 <vmassol> is it?  
09:22 <vmassol> because the migration id is:  
09:22 <vmassol> R40000XWIKI6990  
09:22 <vmassol> doesn't this means migration from 4.0 to later?  
09:22 <vmassol> there's also:  \* @since 4.0M1  
09:23 <vmassol> ok it should be from before 4.0  
09:23 <@cjd> I remember reviewing the code during the 4.0 cycle.  
09:23 <vmassol> since 4.0 isn't included  
09:23 <vmassol> eright?  
09:23 <vmassol> right?  
09:23 <@cjd> I think so.  
09:23 <vmassol> better?  
09:24 <vmassol> it's not just 3.x btw  
09:24 <vmassol> it's any version before 4.0  
09:24 <vmassol> could be 1.x, 2.x, etc  
09:24 <@cjd> indeed  
09:38 <vmassol1> has joined #xwiki  
09:40 <vmassol> has quit  
09:50 <vmassol1> has quit  
09:52 <rrodriguez> has joined #xwiki  
09:53 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
10:13 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
10:14 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
10:21 <CIA-35> tmortagne master \* rac96992 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-commons/commit/ac969924a23eda5baa5c4e10a6e891c227c92388 / (7 files in 5 dirs): XCOMMONS-206: Move XWiki Repository in its own module - http://git.io/Pjk-nA  
10:22 <CIA-35> tmortagne master \* r8829f0b https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/8829f0b5aa5c34b411a0e87630bbe3cf65b4e34f / (33 files in 9 dirs): XWIKI-7973: Move XWiki Repository in its own module - http://git.io/\_A2ukw  
10:22 <CIA-35> tmortagne master \* rcc6bbe7 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/cc6bbe7d4c051ebd7d0f135710dc8fdeaa476a2c / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-repository/xwiki-platform-repository-server-api/src/main/resources/META-INF/components.txt : XWIKI-7973: Move XWiki Repository in its own module - http://git.io/LqSejA  
10:41 <rrodriguez> has quit  
11:12 <+tmortagne> guys could I get some votes on moving PO on platforms  
11:23 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
11:29 <vmassol> Denis2: ping me when you have a few minutes to discuss how we can improve migration speed  
11:33 <jvelo\_> has joined #xwiki  
11:35 <jvelo> has quit  
11:35 <jvelo\_> is now known as <jvelo>  
11:39 <r4is3> has joined #xwiki  
11:39 <r4is3> hi \*  
11:40 <@cjd> howdy  
11:40 <r4is3> could anybody help me to solve migration issue?  
11:40 <@cjd> which versions are you migrating from->to ?  
11:41 <r4is3> it is fromit's from 3.0 from 4.1  
11:41 <r4is3> this thie the error :  
11:41 <@cjd> There is a known issue with that (a bug).  
11:42 <r4is3> ERROR o.h.u.JDBCExceptionReporter    - Data truncation: Out of range value for column 'XWS\_ID' at row 121  
11:42 <r4is3> what about this bug?  
11:42 <vmassol> 4.1 or 4.1.1 or 4.1.2?  
11:42 <vmassol> Denis2: do you know anything about this issue?  
11:42 <@cjd> Ok, this looks like a different issue, can you paste a stack trace?  
11:43 <+sburjan> I didn't get this when testing migrations  
11:43 <@cjd> yeah, we need some good stock lorum ipsum dumps to run migration testing on  
11:43 <Denis2> is now known as <Denis>  
11:43 <r4is3> hum 4.1.2  
11:44 <+Denis> never seen that, seems a schema issue  
11:44 <r4is3> cjd: yes I can, thx  
11:44 <@cjd> my long-being-put-into-int-row sense is tickling...  
11:44 <@cjd> \*column  
11:46 <r4is3> this is my catalin.out  
11:46 <r4is3> http://pastebin.com/1sJnfuQX  
11:51 <+Denis> r4is3: this is not the first launch, it is ?  
11:52 <r4is3> no I've try numerous time  
11:53 <r4is3> with differents parameters in xwiki.cfg  
11:53 <r4is3> but it was useless  
11:53 <+Denis> would it be possible to restart from a fresh backup of the old db ?  
11:53 <r4is3> I've ever done that :/  
11:54 <r4is3> no changes  
11:54 <+Denis> I would like to have the logs that correspond to the first launch on the old db. Is it what you paste ?  
11:56 <jvdrean> has quit  
11:56 <r4is3> arf no, just wait I restore and paste new log  
11:59 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
11:59 <r4is3> http://pastebin.com/KJ0zgD67  
11:59 <r4is3> this is the new log  
12:04 <+Denis> something goes wrong in liquibase  
12:04 <+Denis> it says 19 schema updates required  
12:04 <+Denis> and none are done  
12:05 <+Denis> this is the why for the migration to fail, but I have absolutely no idea why these are not executed  
12:06 <+Denis> mmm  
12:07 <+Denis> r4is3: I do not see the Creating database history table with name: `DATABASECHANGELOG` log  
12:07 <+Denis> this means, it already exists, which is unexpected on a fresh db  
12:07 <r4is3> Denis: can you explain, please?  
12:08 <r4is3> oh thx  
12:08 <+sburjan> Enygma`: Hello. Is it normal behavior when adding an annotation to a page the AS to report that a comment + annotation have been added ? Basically when I add an annotation I get 2 thins, 1) added a comment 2) added a annotation.  
12:08 <r4is3> do I remove the table?  
12:08 <+Denis> r4is3: your backup db should not contains DATABASECHANGELOG tables, or this is not a pre-4.x backup  
12:09 <+Enygma`> sburjan: yes, we`ve discussed that in the past AFAIK.  
12:09 <+Enygma`> sburjan: Hi :)  
12:10 <+evalica> http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-7668  
12:10 <r4is3> hum what is a pre-4.x backup? I did not do anything for preparing migration but I foolowed the xwiki instruuctions migration page  
12:10 <r4is3> :/  
12:10 <+sburjan> Enygma`: evalica : thanks :)  
12:11 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
12:11 <vmassol> Denis: I doubt r4is3 has cretaed this table himself, it must be the migration that did it probably  
12:11 <r4is3> there are 2 tables :  
12:11 <r4is3> DATABASECHANGELOG  
12:11 <r4is3> and  
12:11 <r4is3> DATABASECHANGELOGLOCK  
12:13 <+Denis> yes, these should not exist initially  
12:14 <r4is3> so I totally drop the database and restore once again  
12:14 <+Denis> vmassol: any 4.x will create them, but these should not be there before  
12:14 <r4is3> table does not exit anymore  
12:19 <r4is3> http://pastebin.com/87sDUgPu  
12:19 <r4is3> there is an error : ERROR o.h.u.JDBCExceptionReporter    - Duplicate entry '-5772955715567859860' for key 'PRIMARY'  
12:19 <r4is3> and then data migration failed  
12:20 <r4is3> (line 104)  
12:20 <+Denis> r4is3: which version of XWiki ?  
12:20 <r4is3> from 3.0 from 4.1  
12:21 <+Denis> r4is3: the issue is currently being fix, and will be in 4.1.3 release  
12:21 <r4is3> ok so I just have to wait?  
12:21 <+Denis> if you do not care about your stats, you may empty stats tables, and go ahead, else, you need to wait  
12:22 <r4is3> hum I think it's better to wait ;)  
12:22 <r4is3> so I really thank you for helping me  
12:23 <r4is3> and I'm sorry for my poor english  
12:29 <mflorea> has quit  
12:38 <AndreasJonsson> has joined #xwiki

13:55 <CIA-35> tmortagne master \* r66c3e91 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-enterprise/commit/66c3e91e312aaa071aeb7b8c8189c908bcc87d7c / (3 files in 3 dirs): XE-1201: Move platform applications test pages objects to platform - http://git.io/edVdYg  
14:05 <CIA-35> tmortagne master \* r54e2512 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/54e2512e7d72e617bbbfd3b8151982313180e780 / (2 files in 2 dirs): XWIKI-7979: Move platform applications test pages objects to platform - http://git.io/ewE8MA  
14:05 <CIA-35> tmortagne master \* r0e760ff https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-enterprise/commit/0e760ffd48c9a67e66d11e3adb5aab2a456bd5b8 / (5 files in 3 dirs): XE-1201: Move platform applications test pages objects to platform - http://git.io/rl\_kKg  
14:10 <CIA-35> tmortagne master \* r4c97c84 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-enterprise/commit/4c97c84b40bfdc63e8951af15431a73e3501138a / xwiki-enterprise-test/xwiki-enterprise-test-extension/src/test/it/org/xwiki/test/ui/AllTests.java : XWiki Repository moved in it's own module - http://git.io/yUzJYQ  
14:12 <jvdrean> has quit  
14:14 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
14:32 <CIA-35> tmortagne master \* r70ef9e1 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/70ef9e13c0cfaec6abce2570059aff05fb62c8ac / (10 files in 10 dirs): XWIKI-7979: Move platform applications test pages objects to platform - http://git.io/Bb8afA  
14:49 <r4is3> has left #xwiki  
14:53 <polx> has quit  
15:00 <lucaa> has quit  
15:00 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
15:14 <+sburjan> guys, can you respond to my proposal on the devlist please ?  
15:26 <CIA-35> Andreas Jonsson master \* rac9b234 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-rendering/commit/ac9b23449c8f51fd76ab238a8992c0efeb30c06a / (3 files in 2 dirs): XRENDERING-88: Support macro syntax inside quoted macro parameter values - http://git.io/oTw\_hQ  
15:29 <+sburjan> I have selected the "Require unregistered users to solve a captcha when posting a comment on a page" at a space and wiki level, but when not logged in, I am still not allowed to add a comment.  I have the default/vanilla rights. Am I missing something ?  
15:30 <+sburjan> it seems I have to specifically add the right to comment for unregistered users in order to work .. not very intuitive  
15:32 <CIA-35> tmortagne master \* r4c56d7a https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/4c56d7a9046ffe7d34f77d6765e8fe8362e4912f / (3 files in 2 dirs): Missing headers - http://git.io/\_spBWA  
15:32 <@cjd> Yes, that is not very nice, perhaps the best approach is to throw up a warning that unregistered users cannot comment at all so that the admin can allow them.  
15:32 <ssavi> has joined #xwiki  
15:32 <@cjd> I would say that warrants a jira issue.  
15:33 <+sburjan> afaik the default blank box means default/implicit allow  
15:33 <+sburjan> yes, creating one now  
15:33 <@cjd> Maybe an "improvement" since it's a hard call as to whether it's really a bug  
15:33 <+sburjan> yes, I was thinking at improvement too  
15:44 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
15:47 <vmassol> guys going to put a big disclaimer on the download page to NOT migrate to 4.0+ for users of version <= 3.5.x  
15:48 <vmassol> till we fix the problem  
15:57 <vmassol> cjd: btw you forgot to update the download page  
15:57 <vmassol> (some part of it)  
15:57 <vmassol> it says 4.1 release notes even for 4.1.2  
15:57 <vmassol> fixing it  
16:00 <+sburjan> vmassol: but what fails more exactly ? the stats issue ?  
16:02 <@cjd> ahh you didn't like the line advertizing the 4.1 changes  
16:02 <vmassol> was it on purpose?  
16:02 <@cjd> I put that there since 4.1.1 was so close to 4.1 and there were a lot of nice changes in 4.1 so I thought that would be helpful  
16:03 <vmassol> ok I'll put it back then with a different text  
16:05 <vmassol> the real problem is that the line about the full release notes comes after  
16:10 <vmassol> sburjan: see http://enterprise.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/Download  
16:12 <polx> has quit  
16:12 <+sburjan> thanks  
16:12 <+sburjan> :)  
16:30 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
16:32 <CIA-35> tmortagne master \* r63c531d https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/63c531dd64a2bbf748ff2486b1d2ae059ca08cc9 / (5 files in 5 dirs): XWIKI-7979: Move platform applications test pages objects to platform - http://git.io/cAW7Qw  
16:35 <vdox2> hi  
16:35 <vdox2> why am i getting this error when starting xwiki:  
16:35 <vdox2> Error number 4001 in 4: Error while parsing velocity page /templates/htmlheader.vm Wrapped Exception: Failed to evaluate content with id [/templates/htmlheader.vm]  
16:35 <vdox2> HTML gets rendered but without templates  
16:37 <vdox2> hmm there's more to the error: http://pastebin.ca/2165041  
16:38 <vdox2> Invocation of method 'getToken' in  class org.xwiki.csrf.internal.scripting.CSRFTokenScriptService threw exception java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: org.apache.commons.codec.binary.Base64.encodeBase64URLSafeString([B)Ljava/lang/String; at /templates/htmlheader.vm[line 65, column 55]  
16:38 <vdox2> and that line has the following contents:     <meta name="form\_token" content="$!{services.csrf.token}"/>  
16:41 <+tmortagne> vdox2: "java.lang.NoSuchMethodError" sounds like you have conflicts between XWiki jars and your application server jars  
16:42 <+tmortagne> in this case it's probably on commons-codec  
16:42 <+tmortagne> your application server probably have an older version of commons-code or something like that  
16:43 <vdox2> tmortagne: yes, just figured that out :P  
16:43 <vdox2> the geronimo page on xwiki needs to be fixed  
16:43 <vdox2> I'll add my findings there at some point  
16:43 <+tmortagne> ok cool  
16:48 <@sdumitriu> vdox2: You need to also exclude that class from the classpath, like you did with the logging classes  
16:51 <vdox2> sdumitriu: ok, thanks  
16:54 <CIA-35> Andreas Jonsson master \* r335dd94 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-rendering/commit/335dd940ebf7d65a4f3aed2757048e94ed44da36 / (3 files in 2 dirs): XRENDERING-88: Fixed incorrect pattern. - http://git.io/FdvMQQ  
16:59 <vdox2> yeah, it works now  
17:05 <@sdumitriu> vdox2: That's why I was suggesting to reverse the classloader hierarchy, since you don't know how many more classes have problems  
17:14 <vdox2> sdumitriu: what do you mean by reversing the classloader hierarchy?  
17:15 <@sdumitriu> <inverse-classloading>  
17:15 <@sdumitriu> https://cwiki.apache.org/GMOxDOC30/geronimo-webxml.html  
17:16 <@sdumitriu> Ah, wait, it says "(not supported anymore, use <import-package/> above instead)"  
17:18 <vdox2> "Use <import-package>!packagename</import-package> to override the specific package in server. "  
17:19 <polx> has quit  
17:20 <vdox2> but i see no option to order to prefer the current classloader instead of the parent one  
17:20 <vdox2> now that inverse-classloading is deprecated  
17:20 <vdox2> without specifying the packages explicitly, that is  
17:44 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
17:55 <vmassol> has quit  
18:15 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
18:22 <sburjan> has quit  
18:30 <CIA-35> Marius Dumitru Florea master \* rd26a25c https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/d26a25cd85865954b453fdee5aa5f87d89c658df / (14 files in 3 dirs): XWIKI-7983: Add test page objects for the Extension Manager UI - http://git.io/wX59yA  
18:47 <CIA-35> Marius Dumitru Florea master \* r9c1b82c https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/9c1b82c80b325b7461b3f86bc41e5375fc76ff23 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-watchlist/pom.xml : XWIKI-7979: Move platform applications test pages objects to platform - http://git.io/Js5Nmg

19:34 <tmortagne> has quit  
19:47 <ssavi> has quit  
19:50 <ssavi> has joined #xwiki  
19:55 <polx> has quit  
20:02 <+lucaa> any xwiki-er has any idea how to make bold at the beginning of the line?  
20:02 <+lucaa> if I put  
20:02 <+lucaa> \*\*  
20:02 <+lucaa> I get 2 bullets  
20:02 <+lucaa> as in list and sublist...  
20:02 <+lucaa> any suggestion?  
20:05 <@cjd> This is a wild guess but I'd try (((\*\*boldtext\*\*)))  
20:06 <@cjd> If it's a sentence I'd also try  \*\*firstword\*\* \*\*rest of the sentence\*\*  not very nice indeed but likely to trick the renderer into doing the right thing  
20:07 <@sdumitriu> lucaa: Just don't leave space after the two \*\*  
20:07 <+lucaa> sdumitriu: hm.. lemme try that  
20:07 <+lucaa> sdumitriu: yep, thanks a lot  
20:08 <Inge-> cool

20:35 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
20:40 <ssavi> sdumitriu:Hi  
20:40 <@sdumitriu> Hi ssavi  
20:40 <ssavi> I'm jsut wondering on how to remove the comments attachment tab at the bottom.  
20:41 <ssavi> am creating a search page  
20:55 <@sdumitriu> ssavi: Why do you want to do that?  
20:55 <@sdumitriu> Ah, I see  
20:55 <@sdumitriu> Yes, it's simple  
20:55 <@sdumitriu> Put this in the document content:  
20:58 <@sdumitriu> #set ($showattachments = false)  
20:58 <@sdumitriu> #set ($showcomments = false)  
20:58 <@sdumitriu> Actually, if you want to hide all the tabs, just do:  
20:58 <@sdumitriu> #set ($docextras = [])

22:00 <+Enygma`> could you please share some more details on the "couldn't" part? :)  
22:01 <ssavi> I want to change the timieline so opened in WYSIWYG view and tried editing.. i couldn't add nor delete..  
22:02 <ssavi> i logged in using my credentials..  even if i delete , when i save , it is getting reverted back to what it was before  
22:08 <+Enygma`> well... you need to edit the page in inline mode  
22:08 <+Enygma`> since there's a sheet that is applied to the Project object stored inside the page  
22:08 <+Enygma`> so Edit>Inline  
22:09 <+Enygma`> if you edit in wysiwyg mode, you will only see the rendered include macro that is including the page, but you can not edit the rendered macro's content.
